title: Romantic multi-page static site with animated hearts/stars and two choice pages

acceptanceCriteria: On initial load, the landing page shows the prompt text exactly as provided, including emoji characters.
The landing page uses a cursive-style font for the prompt.
The landing page background is visually filled with hearts (pattern or repeated motif).
Hearts and stars visibly float around the screen (continuous animation).
